idea-plugin.name: codeSTACKr Theme
idea-plugin.description:
codeSTACKr Theme for IntelliJ

A beautiful dark theme with vibrant colors, perfect for long coding sessions.

This theme features:

  • Deep dark background (#09131b) for reduced eye strain
  • Vibrant syntax highlighting with carefully chosen colors
  • Two variants: Regular and Muted for different preferences
  • Optimized for Java, Kotlin, JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, and more

Never stop learning and Never give up!

Based on the popular VS Code theme by codeSTACKr.
